availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Wall (Louisville flour inspector and carpenter)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter and flour inspector. England native. Married Sarah A. Wall and Carrie L. Wall. Carpenter in Louisville in 1860. Flour Inspector in Louisville in 1865.
English-born flour inspector and carpenter. Lived in Louisville. Husband of Sarah A. and father of Carrie L. Wall.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 211. Edwards, Greenough, and DeVed, Publishers, Edwards' Annual Director. City of Louisville, for 1865-6 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co, Printers and Booksellers), 580.
